name: VS Round 1
description: Versus is a fighting game starring comic book characters from Independent publishers/creators. The game is 2d with 3d models featuring specials, parrys and team-ups. You can build a team or run solo but you must make your way through 12 levels beating each character on each team until their health bar reaches 0.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT 710 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 450 MB available space Sound Card: standard
recommended_requirements: OS: Win10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT 710 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Standard
